name: rustpad
description: Rustpad is a collaborative code editor designed to be self-hosted. It includes real-time synchronization and multi-user support using WebSockets in a minimal UI.
features: Real-time collaboration: Edit code simultaneously with multiple users seeing changes instantly.
WebSocket sync: Use efficient WebSocket connections for low-latency synchronization.
Syntax highlighting: View code with proper formatting for multiple programming languages.
Minimal interface: Focus on coding with a clean, distraction-free editor.
No registration: Start collaborating immediately without creating accounts.
Shareable links: Invite others to edit by sharing a simple URL.
Cursor tracking: See where other users are editing in real-time.
Version history: Track changes and revert to previous versions if needed.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and edit efficiently with standard editor hotkeys.
Mobile support: Edit code from tablets and smartphones with touch-optimized controls.
Self-hosted privacy: Keep all code on your own server without third-party access.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal server resources using Rust backend.
